$eref.description: The fully qualified URL to the story. In the Arc ecosystem, this will be populated by the content api from the arc-canonical-url service if present.
$eref.title: Canonical URL

$eref.description: Trait that applies revision information to a document. In the Arc ecosystem, many of these fields are populated in stories by the Story API.
$eref.title: Revision

___user_id.description: The unique user id of the person who created this revision.

___branch.description: The name of the branch this revision was created on.

___parent_id.description: The unique id of the revision that this revisions was branched from, or preceded it on the current branch.

___revision_id.description: The unique id of this revision.

___published.description: Whether or not this revision's parent story is published, in any form or place

___editions.description: A list of identifiers of editions that point to this revision.

$eref.description: The version of ANS that this object was serialized as, in major.minor.patch format.  For top-level content objects, this is a required trait.
$eref.title: Describes the ANS version of this object

$eref.description: The fully qualified URL to the story. In the Arc ecosystem, this will be populated by the content api from the arc-canonical-url service if present.
$eref.title: Canonical URL

$eref.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.
$eref.title: Globally Unique ID trait

$eref.description: Trait that applies information about the owner (typically a news organization) to a document.
$eref.title: Owner information

___owner.description: Information about the owner of this content.

___sponsored.description: Necessary for including/excluding advertorial and native content in search results, story card features.

___id.description: The unique identifier for this owner. In the Arc ecosystem, this is often used to store the organization id.
